entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 before morning. Low 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
